name: GetPVarFloat
notes: Variables aren't reset until after OnPlayerDisconnect is called, so the values are still accessible in OnPlayerDisconnect.
description: Gets a player variable as a float.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player whose player variable you want to get.

params_body.name: varname
params_body.description: The name of the player variable.

return_values: The float from the specified player variable
related_fn:
SetPVarInt: Set an integer for a player variable.
 GetPVarInt: Get the previously set integer from a player variable.
 SetPVarString: Set a string for a player variable.
 GetPVarString: Get the previously set string from a player variable.
 SetPVarFloat: Set a float for a player variable.
 DeletePVar: Delete a player variable.
